text: Taking a short break from Hack Oregon just to say how proud I'm of Uncorked. In the last couple of days I've been asked various times where I work and every time I mentioned Uncorked the response from folks (professionals in the industry and students) has been extremely positive. We're making a great impression in PDX and I can tell people are legitimacy intrigued and impressed by what we do. That's all.
Thanks for being an ambassador for us!!
